702355f-a.title: Brooklyn: 4th Place - Court Street
702355f-a.text:
4th Place, south side, between Court and Smith Streets. The view shows
the South Congregational Chapel.
June 25, 1921.
P. L. Sperr.

702354f-a.title: Brooklyn: 4th Place - Court Street
702354f-a.text:
Fourth Place, east from, but not including Court, to and including
Smith Streets. The view shows several gas tanks of the Brooklyn Union Gas
Company.
June 25, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

703854f-a.title: Brooklyn: Court Street - 4th Place
703854f-a.text:
Court Street, east side, south from 4th Place. At Luquuer
Street is St. Mery's Homan Catholic Church.
Septeaaher 7, 1940
P.  . Sperr  N6 RErRODUCTIONs
